meanings.definition: The quality or state of being historical.
meanings.sent1: The historicalnesses of the ancient ruins fascinated the students.
meanings.sent2: The book delves into the historicalnesses of the Civil War.
meanings.sent3: The historicalnesses of the old photographs made the family laugh at their outdated fashion choices.
meanings.sent4: Her love for historicalnesses was like a treasure trove waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The historicalnesses of the museum came alive through the interactive exhibits.

meanings.definition: The historical aspects or characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: We studied the historicalnesses of the ancient civilization in our history class.
meanings.sent2: The historicalnesses of the building were evident in its architecture.
meanings.sent3: The historicalnesses of the family heirloom sparked a debate on its origin.
meanings.sent4: The historicalnesses of the town were like pages from a living history book.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the historicalnesses of the city brought the past to life.
